text: Yeah it is very rewarding and if you like helping people then it’s a great thing to do

Within the physiotherapy course you have different modules which cover the different types of physiotherapy. For the 1st year I learnt more about anatomy and physiology which gives you the basis for it. Then in 2nd year there were more modules on the different types including: respiratory, neuro, musculoskeletal etc
But I’m currently in my final year at university
